page.title: Fraun Biomedical – Company Profile
page.description: Shenzhen Fraun Technology Service Co., Ltd., founded in 2014, focuses deeply on advanced microscopic imaging and is the exclusive distributor of Switzerland’s SCANCO MEDICAL AG in Greater China.

sections.title: Company Profile
paragraphs: Shenzhen Fraun Technology Service Co., Ltd. (referred to as “Fraun Biomedical”) was established in 2014 and has been dedicated to the field of advanced microscopic imaging. Over the past decade, as the exclusive distributor of Switzerland’s SCANCO MEDICAL AG in the Greater China region (including Mainland China, Hong Kong, Macao, and Taiwan), Fraun Biomedical has built a comprehensive service ecosystem that spans from fundamental research to clinical translation. With more than 70 systems installed, it has continuously maintained a leading market share in the industry.

Relying on an integrated service network that connects universities, research institutes, and medical institutions, we have created China’s first one-stop SCANCO MicroCT high-precision 3D imaging service platform, which includes:
list: End-to-end technical support: from equipment selection and installation to application training
Customized scanning services: providing micro- and sub-micron-level ultra-high-resolution imaging solutions
Full-lifecycle management: 24/7 rapid maintenance and technical response system
sections.footer: Looking ahead, Fraun Biomedical will continue to fulfill its mission of 'Driving Innovation through Microscopic Imaging.' We are building an innovative 'Joint Laboratory' model, forming deep collaborations with government agencies, enterprises, and academic institutions, and striving to become the leader in the new infrastructure of microscopic imaging.

sections.title: Core Values
paragraphs: Excellence in the micro, innovation beyond the micro — empowering cross-dimensional innovation through every micron of imaging.

sections.title: Vision
paragraphs: To become the leader in new infrastructure for microscopic imaging
